sn35.141:3.1: 141. Ajjhattadukkhahetusutta
sn35.141:4.2: Yopi hetu yopi paccayo cakkhussa uppādāya, sopi dukkho.
sn35.141:4.3: Dukkhasambhūtaṃ, bhikkhave, cakkhu kuto sukhaṃ bhavissati … pe …
sn35.141:4.5: Yopi hetu, yopi paccayo jivhāya uppādāya, sopi dukkho.
sn35.141:4.6: Dukkhasambhūtā, bhikkhave, jivhā kuto sukhā bhavissati … pe …
sn35.141:4.8: Yopi hetu yopi paccayo manassa uppādāya, sopi dukkho.
sn35.141:4.9: Dukkhasambhūto, bhikkhave, mano kuto sukho bhavissati.
